Name: Income Tax Cocktail
Ingredients: 2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A Bronx with equal parts rosso and dry vermouths and with Angostura in place of orange bitters.
History: A riff on the Bronx cocktail , the Income Tax cocktail first appeared in Harry Craddock 's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Income Tax Cocktail contains 170 calories
